28 buttons = []
29 skip_buttons = []
30 output = []
31 
32 class Action(Enum):
33  Repeat = 0
34  Back = 1
35  Auto = 2
36  Next = 3
37  Shutdown = 4
38  # Reset = 5
39 
40 
41 def log(msg):
42  output[0].append(msg)
43 
44 def disableButtons():
45  for i in range(0, 5):
46  if not i == Action.Shutdown.value and not i == Action.Auto.value:
47  buttons[i].setEnabled(False)
48 
49  QApplication.setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt.WaitCursor))
50 
51 def enableButtons(fut):
52  if fut.result().success:
53  log("<font color=#a0ffa0>[Succeeded]</font>")
54  else:
55  log("<font color=#ffa0a0>[Failed]</font>")
56 
57  QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
58 
59  for i in range(0, 5):
60  if not i == Action.Shutdown.value and not i == Action.Auto.value and i not in skip_buttons:
61  buttons[i].setEnabled(True)
62 
63  if not fut.result().success:
64  buttons[Action.Next.value].setEnabled(False)
65 
66 class PandaBinPickingClient:
67  _shut_down = rospy.Publisher(SHUTDOWN_TOPIC, Empty, queue_size=1)
68 
69  _capture = rospy.ServiceProxy(CAPTURE_SERVICE, Trigger)
70  _detect = rospy.ServiceProxy(DETECT_SERVICE, Trigger)
71  _plan_approach = rospy.ServiceProxy(PLAN_APPROACH_SERVICE, Trigger)
72  _approach = rospy.ServiceProxy(APPROACH_SERVICE, Trigger)
73  _plan_pick = rospy.ServiceProxy(PLAN_PICK_SERVICE, Trigger)
74  _pick = rospy.ServiceProxy(PICK_SERVICE, Trigger)
75  _plan_lift = rospy.ServiceProxy(PLAN_LIFT_SERVICE, Trigger)
76  _lift = rospy.ServiceProxy(LIFT_SERVICE, Trigger)
77  _plan_lift_alt = rospy.ServiceProxy(PLAN_LIFT_ALT_SERVICE, Trigger)
78  _lift_alt = rospy.ServiceProxy(LIFT_ALT_SERVICE, Trigger)
79  _plan_place = rospy.ServiceProxy(PLAN_PLACE_SERVICE, Trigger)
80  _place = rospy.ServiceProxy(PLACE_SERVICE, Trigger)
81 
82  _executor = ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=1)
83 
84  @staticmethod
85  def capture():
86  # rospy.wait_for_service(CAPTURE_SERVICE)
87  disableButtons()
88  log("Capturing Pointclouds")
89  future = PandaBinPickingClient._executor.submit(PandaBinPickingClient._capture.call)
90  future.add_done_callback(enableButtons)
91  return future

99  return future
